          <title>
            <string language="en">Preparation of yoghurt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorbereitung des Joghurts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Préparation de yaourt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Preparação do yoghurt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Preparazione di yogurt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προετοιμασία του γιαουρτιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Preparación del yogur</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the steps in preparing yoghurt from milk with the aid of lactose-eating bacteria found in natural yoghurt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lactose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microorganisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">milk protein clotting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">preparation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">yoghurt</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Jobsteps, wenn sie 
Joghurt von der Milch mit dem Hilfsmittel des Laktose-Essen Bakteriums
vorbereitet, das im natürlichen Joghurt gefunden wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre les étapes en 
préparant le yaourt du lait à l'aide des bactéries demanger 
trouvées en yaourt normal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra as etapas em preparar
o yoghurt do leite com o dae (dispositivo automático de entrada) das 
bactérias lactose-comer encontradas no yoghurt natural.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra i punti nella 
preparazione del yogurt da latte con l'aiuto dei batteri di 
lattosio-consumo trovati in yogurt naturale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει τα βήματα στην 
προετοιμασία του γιαουρτιού από το γάλα με την ενίσχυση της 
λακτόζη-κατανάλωσης των βακτηριδίων που βρίσκεται στο φυσικό 
γιαούρτι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra los pasos de 
progresión en la preparación del yogur de la leche con la ayuda de 
las bacterias el lactosa-comer encontradas en yogur natural.</string>
          </description>
